templates.template.redirect_from_http.de: Always redirect HTTP requests to HTTPS based on hostname.
templates.template.redirect_from_http.he: This template works without changes, but feel free to adjust the URL pattern to switch from HTTP to HTTPS as needed.
templates.template.redirect_from_www.des: Always redirect HTTP requests from the WWW subdomain to the root (also known as the "apex" or "naked" domain).
templates.template.redirect_from_www.hel: This template works without changes, but feel free to modify the URL pattern to redirect traffic from www to non-www versions if required.
templates.template.cache_everything.desc: Adjust the cache level for all requests.
templates.template.cache_everything.help: This template works without changes, but you can customize the filter or adjust cache settings if needed.
templates.template.bypass_cache_everythi: This template works without changes, but you can customize the filter or adjust cache settings if needed.
templates.template.cache_file_extensions: Replicate Page Rules caching behaviour by making only default extensions eligible for cache.
This template works without changes, but you can customize the filter or adjust cache settings if needed.
templates.template.redirect_to_domain.de: Redirect all requests to a different hostname using HTTPS, keeping the original path and query string.
templates.template.redirect_to_domain.he: Please modify the hostnames to your desired values before deploying this rule.
templates.template.redirect_to_url.title: Redirect to a New URL
templates.template.redirect_to_url.descr: Redirect visitors requesting one page to another page URL.
templates.template.redirect_to_url.helpe: Please update the old path and destination to correctly point users to the right page before deploying this rule.
templates.template.bypass_cache.title: Bypass Cache on Cookie
templates.template.bypass_cache.descript: Bypass cache for requests containing specific cookies.
templates.template.bypass_cache.helper: Please ensure the cookie name matches the one you wish to bypass cache for before deploying this rule.
templates.template.set_edge_cache.title: Set Edge Cache Time
templates.template.set_edge_cache.descri: Cache responses with status code between 200 and 599 on the Cloudflare edge.
templates.template.set_edge_cache.helper: This template works without changes, but itu2019s recommended to set the edge cache time-to-live (TTL) to your preferred value.
templates.template.set_browser_cache.des: Adjust how long a browser should cache a resource.
templates.template.set_browser_cache.hel: This template works without changes, but itu2019s recommended to set the browser cache time-to-live (TTL) to your preferred value.
templates.template.rewrite_path_countrie: Rewrite URLs to serve a different resource to visitors in specific countries.
Please adjust the URI path and country values to your desired settings before deploying this rule.
Rewrite URLs to serve a different resource based on the path of a request.
Please modify the path and destination to correctly serve content to users before deploying this rule.
templates.template.remove_http_header.de: Remove an HTTP header from the request before sending it to the origin.
templates.template.remove_http_header.he: Please update the request header to the one you wish to remove before deploying this rule.
templates.template.add_static_header.des: Add an HTTP header to the response before sending it to the visitor.
templates.template.add_static_header.hel: Please set the desired cookie name and value in the response header before deploying this rule.
templates.template.remove_response_heade: Remove an HTTP header from the response before sending it to the visitor
Please adjust the response header to the one you wish to remove before deploying this rule.
templates.template.redirect_country.desc: Redirect United Kingdom and France visitors to their localized subdomains.
templates.template.redirect_country.help: Please modify the country and hostname as required before deploying this rule.
templates.template.redirect_mobile.title: Redirect Mobile Users
templates.template.redirect_mobile.descr: Redirect requests from mobile users to another subdomain, keeping the URI path of the original HTTP request.
templates.template.redirect_mobile.helpe: Please update the hostname to your desired target before deploying this rule.
templates.template.change_host_header.de: Send a different Host header to the origin.
templates.template.change_host_header.he: Please update the Host header value to your target hostname before deploying this rule.
templates.template.change_port.title: Change Port
templates.template.change_port.descripti: Send a request to the origin on a different port.
templates.template.change_port.helper: Please adjust the destination port to your desired value before deploying this rule.
templates.template.send_botscore_to_orig: Add an HTTP header with the current <0>bot score</0> to the request.
Please specify the custom header name you wish to add before deploying this rule.
templates.template.email_obfuscation_bro: Enable Email Obfuscation and Browser Integrity Check
<0>Email Obfuscation</0> and <1>Browser Integrity Check</1> on a specific path.
Please adjust the URI path to your desired value before deploying this rule.
templates.template.disable_brotli.title: Disable Brotli Compression
templates.template.disable_brotli.descri: <0>Disable Brotli</0> and instead use Gzip compression for all incoming requests.
templates.template.disable_brotli.helper: This template works without changes, however feel free to adjust the settings as needed.
Serve localized welcome pages based on the visitor's location.
Please replace the country codes and target URLs before deploying this code.

templates.snippet.bot_honeypot.descripti: Redirect suspect bots to a honeypot for further analysis.
templates.snippet.bot_honeypot.helper: Please replace the honeypot URL before deploying this code.
Redirect requests from one domain to another, preserving the original path and query string.
Please replace the URL with the one that fits your case before deploying this code.
templates.snippet.bulk_redirects_mapping: Handle bulk redirects based on a predefined map of old to new URLs.
Please replace the external hostname with your specific target before deploying this code.

templates.snippet.ab_test.helper: Please update the URL paths to match the ones relevant to your case before deploying this code.

templates.snippet.append_dates.helper: Please modify the headers to match the ones required for your case before deploying this code.

templates.snippet.validate_jwt.descripti: Validate JSON Web Tokens (JWT) included in incoming requests.
templates.snippet.validate_jwt.helper: This template works without changes, but you may update error messages or make other necessary changes.
templates.snippet.sign_reqs.title: Sign Requests
templates.snippet.sign_reqs.description: Sign outgoing requests with a cryptographic signature.
templates.snippet.sign_reqs.helper: Please replace the secret key and expiration time with your specific values before deploying this code.
templates.snippet.auth_headers.title: Authenticate Using Headers
templates.snippet.auth_headers.descripti: Authenticate incoming requests using custom headers.
templates.snippet.auth_headers.helper: Please replace the custom header key and value with the ones relevant to your case before deploying this code.

templates.snippet.security_headers.descr: Set security-related HTTP headers on responses.
templates.snippet.security_headers.helpe: Please replace the header names and values with those applicable to your situation before deploying this code..

templates.snippet.cors_headers.descripti: Set Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) headers for requests to third-party APIs.
templates.snippet.cors_headers.helper: This template works without changes, but feel free to make updates as needed.
templates.snippet.send_bot_score.title: Send Bot Management Data to Origin
templates.snippet.send_bot_score.snippet: Send Bot Management Data to Origin
templates.snippet.send_bot_score.descrip: Send the bot score to the origin server for analysis.
templates.snippet.send_bot_score.helper: This template works without changes, but feel free to adjust it as required.

templates.snippet.serve_diff_origin.desc: Route requests to different origins based on the response from the initial origin.
templates.snippet.serve_diff_origin.help: Please replace the header name and hostname with the ones applicable to your case before deploying this code.

templates.snippet.suspicious_reqs.descri: Route requests to different origins based on the response from the initial origin.

templates.snippet.return_req_info.helper: This template works without changes, but you may update it if needed.

templates.snippet.timestamp_hex.helper: This template works without changes, but feel free to update as needed..

templates.snippet.redir_403.description: Redirect requests to a different page if the origin server responds with a 403 error code.
templates.snippet.redir_403.helper: Please replace the destination URL with the one that suits your case before deploying this code.

templates.snippet.redact_api.description: Remove specific information from API responses before sending them to the client.
templates.snippet.redact_api.helper: Please replace the array name with the one you want to delete from the API response before deploying this code.

templates.snippet.override_cookies.descr: Override specific Set-Cookies headers with predetermined values.

templates.snippet.rm_resp_headers.helper: Please update the header name to the one relevant to your case before deploying this code..
templates.snippet.rm_qs.title: Remove Query Strings
templates.snippet.rm_qs.description: Remove specific query strings from requests before passing them to the origin server.
templates.snippet.rm_qs.helper: Please update the query strings to the ones you wish to remove before deploying this code.
templates.snippet.send_debug.title: Send Debug Information
templates.snippet.send_debug.description: Send debugging information from errored responses to a designated logging service.
templates.snippet.send_debug.helper: Please replace the logging endpoint hostname with the one that applies to your setup before deploying this code.
templates.page_rules.templates_tab.descr: Cloudflare Rules allows you to make adjustments to requests and responses, configure Cloudflare settings, and trigger specific actions for matching requests.
templates.card.label: Rules Template card
templates.rule.page_rules.description: Trigger certain actions whenever a request matches a defined URL pattern.
templates.rule.redirect.description: Redirect visitors from a source URL to a target URL with a specific HTTP status code.
templates.rule.configuration.description: Customize configuration settings for matching incoming requests.
templates.rule.snippets.description: Perform complex HTTP request and response modifications using JavaScript code.
templates.rule.transform.description: Adjust the URI path, query string, and HTTP headers of requests and responses at the edge.
templates.rule.origin.description: Customize where matching traffic will go and with which parameters.
templates.rule.cache.description: Specify which resources should be cached and for how long.
templates.rule.compression.description: Control how Cloudflare compresses responses delivered to end users.
templates.rule.cloud_connector.descripti: Redirect traffic from your website or application to a defined storage bucket.
